page.title: 15WOMENS ASSOCIATION
page.content: WRI - This has been going for a long time and the association meets once per month in Rhynie School. It is extremely popular with the over thirties. KEEP FIT - This started in 1983 and attracts all age groups. In fact it is so popular that women from Lolatt, a neighbouring village, have joined it. It meets once per week. LADIES CIRCLE - This was started in 1985 and it is trying to attract the younger women who feel The WRI or Womens Guild does not appeal to them. It also meets once per month. WOMENS GUILD - This is run by the local church and meets once per month. BADMINGTON - There is a special weekly session from October to Easter and has proved popular.
